verses.roman:
śrī-rūpe śikṣā karāi' pāṭhāilā vṛndāvana
āpane karilā vārāṇasī āgamana

synonyms: śrī-rūpe śikṣā karāi'-teaching Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; pāṭhāilā—sent; vṛndāvana—toward Vṛndāvana; āpane—Himself; karilā—did; vārāṇasī—to Benares; āgamana—coming.
translation: After instructing Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī at Prayāga at the Daśāśvamedha-ghāṭa, Caitanya Mahāprabhu ordered him to go to Vṛndāvana. The Lord then returned to Vārāṇasī.
